gov.nasa.jpf.search.heuristic

Class HeuristicState

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.jpf.search.heuristic.HeuristicState
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PrioritizedState

    public abstract class HeuristicState
extends Object
    wrapper for states that are processed in an order that is defined by a heuristic (i.e. not just depends on the shape of the state graph)
